rationale: The segment states factual information but does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: No human cases have been documented from this strain of the avian flu in the U.S., and only one has been reported in Europe, said Todd Davis, lead of the CDC's zoonotic virus team in virology surveillance.

rationale: The segment factually reports 'No human cases have been documented' and 'only one has been reported'.
